description:
SKTimeStamp is a very simple shell extension which adds a new tab to the Windows Explorer properties dialog. On that new tab, you can change the file/folder date and time.
![screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stefankueng/tools/main/www/source/img/sktimestamp/SKTimeStamp_multiple.png)
summary: A shell extension to TimeStamp file/folders
author: Stefan Kueng
